hotels.title: Sri Lanka Resort Luxury on Kalutara Peninsula with Four Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Located on a private palm-fringed peninsula on Sri Lanka's western coast, between an azure lagoon and the crashing sea, is Avani Kalutara Resort. Delve into a world of tropical adventure and limitless indulgence, with watersports, abseiling and bike tours aplenty. Wind down with a traditional healing treatment at the adjacent Anantara Spa and end your evening at any of the four onsite restaurants and bars, serving upscale eats and drinks from Italian to Asian fare.

hotels.title: Beachfront Sri Lanka Island Luxury with Top-Rated Day Spa
hotels.description: Be charmed by the tropical whims and luxurious facilities you'll find with a stay at Anantara Kalutara Resort on Sri Lanka's sun-kissed southwest coast. The architectural vision of Geoffrey Bawa has come to life: contemporary styling meets authentic and traditional Sri Lankan craft. Blissful days can be spent splashing about in the resort's swimming pools, savouring teppanyaki or Italian fine dining (among other dining options), or succumbing to total pampering at the Anantara Spa.
